messages.content:
Listen to the latest Desi Hits! Remix, as Britney Spears and Sonu Nigam remix her track "I Wanna Go". 

http://www.desihits.com/remixes/britneyspears
After the HOT Desi remixes to "Born This Way", Lady Gaga is back with two more Desi remixes to "Judas".  Check out both versions from music duo Salim-Sulaiman and Bhangra producer Panjabi MC!
Take a listen to the Bollywood (produced by Dj Lloyd) and Urban Desi remix (produced by Culture Shock) of Nicole Scherzinger latest hit single 'Right There'
